definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
to be keen on/to have a passion for

pinyin: yan4 ku4 qiu2 bao1 zi3 jun1

definition: UN convention against torture and cruel treatment (ratified by PRC in 1988)
pinyin: fan3 ku4 xing2 zhe2 mo2 gong1 yue1

sentences.english: We are all cool kids with our own interests.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是擁有自己興趣的酷孩子。

sentences.english: Even my always "cool" daddy was almost burst into tears and he gave me a very warm hug.
sentences.chinese: 連一向很“酷”的爸爸也快要哭了，還抱了抱我。

sentences.english: Outside in daylight, it is a cool bluish mossy green .
sentences.chinese: 白天在外面，這是一個酷藍藍苔蘚綠。

sentences.english: It's just a matter that China is not cool in the meda right now.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的問題就是中國現在在媒體的宣傳裏面還不夠酷。

sentences.english: His stage name stands for "Ladies Love Cool James."
sentences.chinese: 他的藝名代表着“女士鍾愛酷詹姆斯”。

sentences.english: Download cool ringtones, wallpapers, videos, or games.
sentences.chinese: 下載酷鈴聲，壁紙，視頻或遊戲。

sentences.english: Not so cool, perhaps, but certainly very solid and with enviable revenue.
sentences.chinese: 雖然沒那麼酷了，但是非常健康，收入讓人眼饞。

sentences.english: Which looks kinda cool in my humble opinion.
sentences.chinese: 依我拙見，這看起來有一些酷。

sentences.english: At first it looked cool and I was really pumped .
sentences.chinese: 首先，真他媽的酷，我被小震撼了一把。

sentences.english: "Female fist hand " become for a time " cruel " pronominal.
sentences.chinese: “女拳手”一度成爲“酷”的代名詞。

sentences.english: Then the reality will not let the cold cold change of heart.
sentences.chinese: 再冷的現實也不能讓心變冷酷。

sentences.english: One of the cool features of this board is its high level of customizability.
sentences.chinese: 其中的酷炫功能的這個委員會是其高水平的定製。

sentences.english: A martini defined cool and modern.
sentences.chinese: 馬提尼代表着酷和新潮。

sentences.english: Kua is a teacher, and then I thought.
sentences.chinese: 當老師真是酷啊，那時的我這麼想。

sentences.english: ” which is Chinese Internet-speak meaning cool, or powerful.
sentences.chinese: ，這是中國表示酷或強大的網絡用語。

sentences.english: Well, don"t listen to that, because they do at least help."
sentences.chinese: 噢，別思少啦，至少他們可以助您“酷”一面面哦。

definition: (neologism) (of movies, songs etc) affecting/touching/moving/(of a person, esp. a woman) charming/cool
reserved/aloof/(geography) (of a location) elevated and cold
good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
to sprout/to bud/to have a strong affection for (slang)/adorable (loanword from Japanese 萌え moe, slang describing affection for a cute character)
